routes.name: Home
routes.description: The main landing page of the website.

routes.name: Not Found
routes.description: The fallback page displayed when a route is not found.

routes.name: Account
routes.description: The user account page where profile details can be managed.

routes.name: Cart
routes.description: The shopping cart page displaying items added by the user.

routes.name: Checkout
routes.description: The checkout page for completing purchases.

routes.name: Contact
routes.description: The contact page for users to reach out to support or inquiries.

routes.name: Shop
routes.description: The main shop page displaying available products.

routes.name: Product Details
routes.description: The product details page for a specific item.

routes.name: Sign In
routes.description: The login page for users to access their accounts.

routes.name: Sign Up
routes.description: The registration page for new users to create an account.

routes.name: Verify Account
routes.description: The account verification page for confirming user registration.

routes.name: Wishlist
routes.description: The wishlist page displaying items saved by the user for later.
